item.title: About us
item.author: jean.terracommuni@wecena.com (Jean Millerat, Agence Française de Développement)
item.description: TerraCommuni is a free and open source data initiative by the Agence Francaise de Developpement (AFD). It is lead and maintained by Jean Millerat on behalf of the AFD.

item.title: Add a new ceremony
item.author: jean.terracommuni@wecena.com (Jean Millerat, Agence Française de Développement)
item.description: Copy the handwritten information from the ceremony papersheet. Date and local time from the ceremony sheet Identifier of the organizer from the ceremony sheet Location from the ceremony sheet Latitude: Longitude: Ethereum block from the ceremony sheet Block number: Block hash: Pictures and videos from the ceremony Pictures: Videos:
